name: Tuli Health
headline: Transforming pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers
description:
Tuli health is turning all 11 000 independent pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers.  Our software makes it easy for these pharmacies to sell and fulfill COVID-19 tests today and other diagnostic tests tomorrow. Instead of waiting for a long time or travelling a long distance to receive the tests, customers can now receive tests in their neighbourhood, with results guaranteed in 24 hours. 

Tuli Health was launched in June, had onboarded 147 pharmacies, performed over 7000 diagnostic tests, and helped pharmacies generate $1.3 million in incremental revenue per month. 

The vision is to make every local pharmacy into a diagnostic center powered by Tuli Health.

founders.name: Jialu Tu, Founder
founders.description:
Jialu is a massive nerd, hence why it came to no surprise to anyone when he decided to do Maths at Imperial College London. However, after Imperial College, he strayed to the wrong path by going into financial services, where he stayed for close to 10 years observing how bad the sector as a whole is in terms of their tech. Being disappointed in FS and himself, he is now atoning his sins by doing a startup in the healthcare space.

And yes, that is a Red Hat red hat.

# Get Clinical Services from your Nearest Pharmacy
We’re making key services like blood testing available from every high street so that everyone can get the care they need in their own neighbourhood.
[Start now![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a42049acba5ff247df92c_Vector%201%20\(2\).svg)](https://tuli.health/<https:/portal.tuli.health>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a7be6a2bc19e0d2ac0c5b_image_homepage%2001%20\(2\).webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a34906389266d1518e4a6_Subtract.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a3493d5faf988f664ea1d_Rectangle%2024.png)
## 70% of all clinical decisions are influenced by diagnostic testing. At Tuli, we empower and enable pharmacies to become local diagnostic hubs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a5ed4e76bd56337433492____.webp)
308 pharmacy partnersAcross the UK
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a5edee5b5a6b9f5f450b8____.webp)
Convenient locationsA pharmacy on every high-street and neighbourhood
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a5ee305142477c120233a____.webp)
Highly skilled Providing quality clinical services
## Our solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a741ffe061709c3a96658_Vector.webp)
### One network
For providers who just need phlebotomy
Got kits and a lab lined up, but looking for a white-label partner to perform the draw? Allow us to plug that gap. Simply book in the test and after the appointment, your patient will be handed the sample back to pop into the post. Then, it’ll head straight to your lab.
[Find out more](https://tuli.health/</phlebotomy-network>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a741f1ae3749de2c3e9de_foto_shapes.webp)
### One solution
For providers who need the whole package
Complete end-to-end testing. Once the test is booked at your patient’s preferred hub, we’ll post them the kit to bring to their appointment. They’ll be handed back the sample afterwards to post it to our partner lab (postage is prepaid). We’ll send you the results asap.
[Find out more](https://tuli.health/</end-to-end>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669a741f0eecb7e06cfdfe1c_foto_shapes%20copy.webp)
### Enterprise
For providers who need a tailored solution
Best suited to providers who need a custom-made solution. Perhaps you’ve got your own test kits but would like to use our partner labs, or you would like some advice on logistic solutions for blood samples, or more complex digital integration. We can support the entire testing process, so whatever you’ve got in mind, we’d be delighted to help.
Contact us Now
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669f6670cf6561e17f4aaf73_We%20make%20blood%20testing%E2%80%A8hassle%E2%80%93free.webp)
### We make blood testing hassle–free
Sifting through paperwork, phoning up labs and providers, your patients needing to take a half day off work to schlep into a central location for a blood draw. For too long, that’s all been part and parcel of arranging a blood test. But with us, all it takes is a few clicks. You only need to register your patient via our portal and they’ll be emailed a booking link to pick a test time and location.And that’s it, you’re sorted. We’ll handle everything else.
## Let us handle the heavy lifting around testing so you can do what you do best: caring for your patients

## You’re in excellent hands
![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/657713c0e5a56d3e50ea117d_check.svg)
CQC registered
![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/657713c0e5a56d3e50ea117d_check.svg)
Quality control. Every one of our hubs is assessed and upskilled to a gold standard
![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/657713c0e5a56d3e50ea117d_check.svg)
Tech-forward and agile. We’ve got an in-house development team so we can build and pivot as necessary. Our API capabilities are impressive, too
![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/657713c0e5a56d3e50ea117d_check.svg)
Much, much less admin. Our smooth and simple system streamlines the booking process, so it’s super quick and easy
![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/657713c0e5a56d3e50ea117d_check.svg)
Boost patient retention. Use this added service to offer even more value
![Check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/657713c0e5a56d3e50ea117d_check.svg)
Attentive customer support. Speak to a human who will always try their best to help you
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669e281940364d4ca49f2e11_Placeholder%20Image.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669e280fd66d95c420942e5c_Placeholder%20Image%20\(4\).webp)
## We go beyond just the phlebotomy
Tuli is made of community pharmacies, who we see as integral to the future of healthcare.We upskill and support pharmacies to provide clinical services such as diagnostic tests, to transform them to health hubs. Our vision is to have a hub on every high street in the UK.
### Where patients can get primary care services locally and with ease.
## Here’s what else our hubs can deliver
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669e3eda945d3ffb1ab22fe3_Placeholder%20Image.webp)
### Health checks that help you live better
Book your test online and pop down the road to the pharmacy to have it done. Get clear, actionable insights on how to improve your health and better understand your body with our wide range of health tests. Screen for conditions or assess general health, like nutritional profiles and hormone levels.
[Services](https://tuli.health/<https:/portal.tuli.health/#/medtest>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/669e3ee216dd433de2336a6d_Placeholder%20Image.webp)
### A weight loss programme that works
There’s no quick fix to losing weight in a healthy way. It’s long-term changes that’ll do the trick—and our programme is designed to help people make them.
  * Get advice from pharmacists
  * Pick up prescribed medication
  * Get ongoing support


[Learn more](https://tuli.health/</weight-loss-programme>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/65786490407e7b62e4727e4e_Component%2034.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64e49a7ce0188b245ddfb1e1/6578649bac37e9ab4039bcc8_Component%2035.webp)
## Sort blood tests for your patients right away. No paperwork, phone calls, or extra admin
Sort blood tests for your patients right away. No paperwork, phone calls, or extra admin.
Contact us

generated_description:
### Tuli Health: Transforming Pharmacies into Diagnostic Centers

**Company Overview:**
Tuli Health, founded in 2021 and a participant in Y Combinator’s Batch S21, is on a mission to revolutionize healthcare by transforming the UK's 11,000 independent pharmacies into diagnostic centers. Primarily based in London, their innovative software streamlines the sale and fulfillment of diagnostic tests—starting with COVID-19 testing and expanding into a broader range of diagnostic services.

**What They Do:**
Their core offering is to enable local pharmacies to perform diagnostic tests conveniently, allowing customers to get tested in their neighborhoods rather than traveling long distances. With a promise of 24-hour result delivery, Tuli Health is a game changer for both pharmacies and patients.

**Achievements:**
Since launching in June 2021, Tuli Health has successfully onboarded 147 pharmacies and conducted over 7,000 diagnostic tests, generating an impressive $1.3 million in additional revenue for pharmacies each month. Currently, they are working with 308 pharmacy partners across the UK, illustrating a rapidly growing network.

**Team and Leadership:**
The company operates with a lean team of four employees, focused on maximizing impact. Their Group Partner, Diana Hu, brings strategic oversight to their mission-driven endeavors.

**Services Offered:**
Tuli Health provides several key services, including:
- **Phlebotomy Network:** Partnering with providers for blood draws.
- **End-to-End Testing Solutions:** Comprehensive testing processes, including kit dispatch and result reporting.
- **Health Checks:** Available for various health conditions and general wellness.

Their weight loss program is also tailored for those pursuing long-term health improvements, with ongoing pharmacist support.

**Vision for the Future:**
Tuli Health envisions a future where every local pharmacy becomes a health hub, equipped to deliver essential diagnostic services right on the high street. By optimizing local access to healthcare, they aim to facilitate better health outcomes for the community.

**Website:** For further information, visit [Tuli Health](https://tuli.health).

**In Summary:**
Tuli Health is ambitious in its approach to local healthcare, remodeling community pharmacies into accessible diagnostic centers. They're addressing a critical need in modern healthcare—convenience—while supporting pharmacies through innovative technology and strategic partnerships.
